notes: Prefer RSS if present on page; fallback scrape press release list.
WFE official news/press releases listing.
WFE magazine Focus 'News' features; useful for industry commentary.
CFTC provides multiple RSS feeds (press releases, enforcement, rules, etc.) via index.
NFA provides RSS feeds for key sections; parse feed list page then subscribe to chosen feeds.
IOSCO media releases list; site may not provide RSS; scrape list.
BIS RSS index page; choose feeds relevant to market infrastructure/regulation.
ESMA press releases listing; scrape list and follow detail links.
FCA news page provides an RSS feed link.
CME publishes multiple RSS feeds (press releases, clearing advisories, Globex advisories, etc.) via a directory page.

ICE exchange/corporate releases are most reliably obtained via email alerts (subscription form). For futures notices/circulars, also consider ICE Futures US/Europe notice pages plus email subscriptions.
Notices page describes updates; content may be JS-rendered; recommended to pair with email alerts as primary source.
Circulars page; content may be JS-rendered; recommended to pair with email alerts.
Circulars page; may be JS-rendered; recommended to pair with email alerts.
Use sitemap to capture new LME press releases and notices pages; filter URLs containing '/news/press-releases/' and optionally '/api/sitecore/MemberNoticesSearchApi/Download'.
Official RSS for B3 trading support news (English).
MCX official RSS - media press releases.
MCX official RSS - circulars (CTCL).
MCX official RSS - membership & compliance circulars.
MCX official RSS - technology circulars.
HKEX provides RSS for HKFE participant circulars and trading rule updates.
HKEX RSS: updates to HKFE trading rules.
JPX RSS: trading halt (derivatives).
JPX RSS: market news (broad).
Eurex Implementation News RSS (technical/system updates).
Press releases RSS for Xetra/Deutsche Börse Cash Market page.
